item.title: By: Dee Scott
item.dc:creator: Dee Scott
item.description: Definitely one of my favorites. Sweet but creamy mmmmmm
item.content:encoded: Definitely one of my favorites. Sweet but creamy mmmmmm

item.title: By: ListlessSpectre
item.dc:creator: ListlessSpectre
item.description: I wanted to give this one a fair shot at discerning the flavor profile to determine exactly where it's going and I get a slight hint of what seems like amaretto, but there's too little flavor to it. I put some of this in a Kayfun Monster V1 which is well reputed as a flavor chasing tank and I didn't get much from it. It's mildly sweet (probably from being max VG) and there's little to no flavor. I also tried this in an Origin Genesis with 400 grade mesh and .05 kanthal ribbon wire....same result.I love the peeps at CC, but this particular flavor is meh at best.
item.content:encoded: I wanted to give this one a fair shot at discerning the flavor profile to determine exactly where it’s going and I get a slight hint of what seems like amaretto, but there’s too little flavor to it. I put some of this in a Kayfun Monster V1 which is well reputed as a flavor chasing tank and I didn’t get much from it. It’s mildly sweet (probably from being max VG) and there’s little to no flavor. I also tried this in an Origin Genesis with 400 grade mesh and .05 kanthal ribbon wire….same result.I love the peeps at CC, but this particular flavor is meh at best.

item.description: One of my all time favorites
